title: Light Hammer Proficiency
content:
Light Hammer Proficiency Effect Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with light hammers. Requirements Dwarf

Light Hammer Proficiency

Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with light hammers.

Light Hammer Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
